A C E G I S T U _ 

A

Agent - Class in cs524.controlsystem
Defines an arbitrary physical agent (assumed to be a boat in CS 524 Task 3) in two-dimensional space.
Agent(double, double, double, double, boolean) - Constructor for class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
 
AZIMUTH_DELTA_DELTA - Static variable in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
for noninstantaneous deflection, the current azimuth updates toward the target azimuth by this value once per update
AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT - Static variable in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
the positive and negative limit to azimuth delta

C

CIRCLE_DEGREES - Static variable in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
the degrees in a circle
cs524.controlsystem - package cs524.controlsystem
 

E

EPSILON - Static variable in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
the plus/minus band for accepting that the current azimuth has reached the target azimuth

G

getAzimuth() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the current azimuth of the agent.
getAzimuthDelta() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the current signed angle on [-AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT,+AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT] by which the azimuth changes per update.
getAzimuthDeltaTarget() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the desired signed angle on [-AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT,+AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT] by which the azimuth changes per update.
getSpeed() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the current speed of the agent.
getStateCSV() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the state of the agent in string comma-separated-values form.
getStateGnuplot() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the state of the agent in string comma-separated-values form.
getX() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the x position of the agent.
getY() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the y position of the agent.

I

isDeflectionInstantaneous() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets whether deflection to a new azimuth delta is instantaneous, otherwise incremental.
isProximate(double, double, double) - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Determines whether the agent is within a certain distance of a point.

S

setAzimuthDeltaTarget(double) - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Sets the desired signed angle on [-AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT,+AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT] by which the azimuth changes per update.

T

toString() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Gets the state of the agent in string form.

U

update_() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Updates the current azimuth and position of the agent.
updateAzimuth() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Updates the azimuth of the agent by one delta toward the target.
updatePosition() - Method in class cs524.controlsystem.Agent
Updates the position of the agent based on the current speed and azimuth.

_

the current azimuth of the agent
